component.name: MultiFlexi CLI
component.summary: Command-line interface for MultiFlexi system management

description.p: MultiFlexi CLI is a powerful command-line interface tool for managing and interacting with the MultiFlexi system. It allows administrators and users to list, create, get, and delete MultiFlexi resources directly from the terminal.

The CLI supports JSON output for easy integration with other tools and scripts, and provides internationalization support. This package is intended for users who prefer or require command-line access to MultiFlexi's features.
